head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Storekeeper Shot

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Storekeeper Shot

body.head.byline: By JENNIFER 8. LEE; Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: The owner of an Ozone Park bodega was shot last night in what investigators believe was an attempted robbery of his store, the police said. Three men entered the bodega, at 133-45 135th Street, around 9:30 p.m. and shot the owner in the face, the police said. He was taken to Jamaica Hospital Medical Center, where he was in critical condition.
